desc: nucao is the chocolate innovation of the year combining the tastiness of chocolate with the functionality of hemp seeds. Customers get their hands on a both sinfully delicious & at the same time highly nutritious chocolate bar. nucao is 100% natural, organic, vegan, low carb and its packaging is fully home-compostable.

layout.text:
SAY HELLO TO A CHOCOLATE BAR THAT CHECKS ALL THE BOXES.
ENJOY BENEFITS FROM DELICIOUS HEMP SEEDS AND RAW CACAO,
AND KISS REFINED SUGAR GOODBYE.
